mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_product_review VALUES ( product_review_seq.nextval, #{product_id}, #{writer_id}, #{review_content}, sysdate, #{review_rate} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.product_review_id, r.review_content, r.review_date, r.review_rate, r.writer_id, u.nickname FROM tbl_product_review r LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_user u ON u.user_id = r.writer_id WHERE product_id=#{product_id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.product_review_id, r.review_content, r.review_date, r.review_rate, r.writer_id, u.nickname FROM tbl_product_review r LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_user u ON r.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE product_id = #{product_id} ORDER BY review_rate DESC, review_date DESC ) WHERE rownum = 1

SELECT r.product_review_id, r.review_content, r.review_date, r.review_rate, r.writer_id, u.nickname FROM tbl_product_review r LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_user u ON r.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE r.product_review_id = #{product_review_id}

SELECT r.product_review_id, r.review_content, r.review_date, r.review_rate, r.writer_id, u.nickname FROM tbl_product_review r LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_user u ON r.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE r.writer_id = #{user_id}
